case.state: ... M-my name is YunYun! An arch-wizard and... um, it's n-nice to m-meet you all!
... M-my name is YunYun! An arch-wizard and future Chief to the entirety of the C-Crimson Demons! Be c-careful for... (Eris, this introduction is so embarrassing!!)
Ah, Kazuma, I'm sorry to interrupt your time with Megumin. But it is I, YunYun! F-Fate has brought me and Megumin together once again!
My lifelong rival Megumin! How odd to see you here! I g-guess since we're both here we might as well duel! Uh, please!
Kazuma! W-Where is M-Megumin? S-She told me to come here...
Uh, wait! Has anyone seen a mage named Megumin? She's my rival! And she invited me here for a duel!
I, um, c-challenge you to whatever game we're playing!
I, um, c-challenge you to whatever game we're playing! And Kazuma, you will watch, to record my victory once and for all!
... I guess since I'm here I'll play... (And hopefully make friends!)
C-can we stop playing for just a second and all talk about our ambitions? No? O-okay!
I've got a bad feeling about these ~cards~ cards... I've also got a bad feeling in general...
C-can I have ~cards~ new cards? Sorry for being a nuisance!
I'll swap these ~cards~ cards... um, if I'm allowed to!
I'm getting used to this! ~cards~ new cards dealer! W-wait, I didn't mean to sound pushy!
Can I get ~cards~ new cards? You'll give me them? Really?
Oh, um, can I get ~cards~ cards? Wait, I'll keep these ones if you want me to!
(If I ask to swap these ~cards~ cards, maybe people will think I'm smart!)
I'd like ~cards~ cards please. You can take your time dealer! No need to rush! I'm enjoying spending time with everyone and I want this game to last!
Hey, can I get ~cards~ cards? And, um, how are you doing today dealer? Um, do you want to hang out after this game? No? Maybe some other time?
If you see my rival Megumin, please tell her that I did good this hand!
Careful! I've played countless games of poker by myself. And won everytime!
I guess I can use these cards... T-this hand is good, r-right?
An experienced Crimson Demon like me was destined to get these cards! Uh, wait, that was embarrassing to say! Forget that!
Let us make a little wager! If I win this hand, you all have to hang out with me after the game!
Wait, this hand is good! I'm not going to lose! I'm going to win! Yay!
I got a good hand? Wait, I'm not surprised! I was o-one of the first of my class to g-graduate, after all!
If I win can I earn a Skill-Up potion? No? T-That's fine... I probably didn't deserve one anyway...
I got a good hand! I got a good hand! This game is so fun!
This is a really lucky hand! Thanks so much dealer!
Hehe, what a hand! A Crimson Demon never loses! Uh, except for those times I lost before. Forget about those please!
Wow, dealer! This hand is the nicest thing anyone has ever done for me!
Well, at least I have a pair! Of cards that is. I wish I knew somebody who was like me...
I'm, uh, the future chief to the Crimson Demon Clan! That means you should r-respect me! P-please!
Please let this hand win! (I really need the self-esteem boost right now!)
This is an average hand... average like me I guess...
This hand is good enough... I'll be okay as long as I don't lose!
I've always wanted to play a game of strip poker with others! Well, I didn't imagine the strip or the poker part...
I hope you haven't heard any rumors about me... I promise, whatever they are they are untrue! Unless they are nice ones!
Oh... um, well I don't know what to even make of this hand. That's kind of exciting, r-right?
It'd be nice if we could all win...
I'll win even with these cards! J-Just watch! But not too i-intently!
This game isn't some kind of trick to get me n-naked, right? Wait! I'm sorry for questioning you all! Don't hate me!
I don't deserve this awful hand! Why is everything so cruel?!
I hate this game! I mean not the game! It's just the c-cards! I mean, sorry!
I'm a Crimson Demon! I should be doing better than this!
What is wrong with me? Why do I keep losing? I'm an arch-wizard, I should be doing better than this!
Aw, I'll lose for sure with this terrible hand! But I'll get you all next time so watch out!
T-thanks for playing with me! Even if I lost this hand, I'm still having fun!
Everytime I lose, I just get more determined to win! And everytime I l-lose, um, I also get a bit more n-naked!
I'll w-win and finally defeat you Megumin! Once... I, uh, figure out how to play!
Wait, she's not here?! I'm s-sure she'll arrive eventually! She wouldn't trick me like this, right?! I'll just, uh, keep playing for now!
(This girl looks rather lonely! If anybody needs a friend... It must be her!)
(~name~ seems really embarrassed... I feel so sorry for her! Do you think anyone would notice if I tried throw this hand for her?)
Is it true you are in a romantic relationship ~name~? That must be... wonderful...
I'd quite like a Pokémon. It'd be nice to have someone to be unconditionally your friend...
You seem quite lonely ~name~. I could become your friend if you wish? P-Please?
Whilst you may be quite vulgar ~name~... At least you are talking me to me...
I see you are also wearing a "friend-making" outfit. I'm a little unsure if mine needs to be skimpier as it's not worked so far...
Are you one of those NEETs ~name~? Whilst I do not normally associate with that type I would be happy to introduce you to the world of adventures! And maybe you could show me a video game or two...
A fellow adventurer? If you ever need help, I am available! I will even work for free!
What types of adventures have you went on ~name~? We could exchange stories of our travels and... bond over them.
Wait, I've got to do what for losing?! No, wait, I'll strip! Just don't hate me!
Well, I guess it is unfair if I never lose...
I feel really left out if you are all stripping and I'm not!
Oh, I don't want to be the only one clothed! Or, I mean, I do but...
I, um, you guys are really nice so I'm fine with stripping...
Oh, this game is getting really really close! It's so exciting!
This is e-embarrassing but I wouldn't play this game if I didn't want to! Not that I want to strip!
I guess it's my turn... um, just don't stare! Or, um, you can if you want!
P-Please don't laugh! I promise you, there's nothing funny about me! Wait, I mean, I'm hilarious, okay?!
Oh, um, it's only a small thing I have to remove, right?
Oh, um... if you are all seeing me like, uh, this. Then we are automatically friends, right?
You know... even you don't think of me as a friend. I see all of you as my friends! And that's all that matters!
I-I'm still going to win! I-I'm just going to be a little more n-naked as I do so!
I just want to remind you all that I could leave if I wanted to! And that means you should respect my resolve and like me for staying!
If anyone laughs, I'll make you regret it! I know magic! Believe me!
I keep losing! Are you guys bullying me?!
Even if I'm badly losing... T-thank you for letting me p-play with you all!
Well, um, that's a-another loss...
If I didn't know any better I'd say this game was just a ploy to see me naked! But you wouldn't do that, right? Right?!
I might be constantly losing but I still deserve respect! Even just a tiny tiny amount, please!
D-Don't worry about making me feel bad... I'm used to l-losing...
Um... Megumin? You know how you told me this outfit would help me make friends? It's not, um, working. It's just really embarrassing me...
I wear this outfit because I was told it'd help me make friends... It's working, right?
These clothes are a little... embarrassing. But a trustworthy source told me they'd help make friends! It doesn't seem to have happened yet...
Don't judge me for my clothes! This is my friend-making outfit! M-Megumin told me it'd help!
Erm, well... I guess even a Crimson Demon can't win everytime... (Even if Megumin wins every duel we have...)
I'm not lonely! I am just really really self-sufficient!
I'll take off my boots and get comfortable, I guess. Or at least try and get comfortable...
For the first time I'm glad that as a Crimson Demon I have to wear all these strange accessories... otherwise I'd already have lost...
Eek! Uh, that's how an ordinary person would react to losing, right?
I-I'm not insecure! About my body that is...
You can do this YunYun... you are a Crimson Demon!
Crimson Demons should care little about nudity! But, um, they do care about losing...
O-oh, Eris! T-This is all I have l-left! Er, uh, don't laugh at me! I-I'll do it!
I'm s-sorry for being so w-weird... I'm sure you'd rather play with a different member of the Crimson Demons...
There's my belt. It... uh, doesn't hold anything up. So it's mostly useless. (Like me...)
T-this is so e-embarrassing! B-but even if my chances of winning may be virtually nothing... as long as they aren't absolutely nothing, I'll never give up!
The tie is just a fashion accessory! Losing it won't stop me from winning! It'll just make me one step closer to losing! Wait, that's bad!
I hope I get better cards next round... I deserve that at least...
This game kind of reminds me of my many duels with Megumin... And it's just as embarrassing!
Hmph, okay! I'm done losing now! Promise! You better watch out because I'm going to use all the training I've had as a Crimson Demon!
I-I thought these p-panties were c-cute okay! They a-are, right?
Y-You can stare... But only if you consider me a friend! And if you look, you're automatically a friend!
A-are these okay? I know they are p-probably t-too big...
You might think this is embarrassing! But for someone like me who is experienced in the art of humiliation, it's just another day! Wait, that's a bad thing!
Oh... ~player~ lost? That's good. Really good. Not because I want to see him naked! Just because, uh, uh... Nevermind!
(I want everyone to be my friend... but I really really want ~player~ to be my friend for some reason!)
Why does ~player~ make me feel weird? Wait, did I say that aloud?! So embarrassing...
You know... you don't talk much ~player~. I've always thought my type of guy would be quiet and reserved... W-wait, w-why am I telling you this?!
T-Thanks for spending time with me ~player~... you're making this game really fun...
H-Hey, ~player~? Is it okay if I tell everyone you're my friend? Not in a weird way! Promise!
Oh... you've got to strip ~player~. I-Is it okay if I watch?!
Even though you don't talk to me ~player~, that's still nicer than how most people treat me!
Even if you lose, all that matters is that you tried! Why does nobody ever tell me that?
... You've got to strip, right? That was a question, not a demand! Sorry!
I, um, this game is kind of lewd... isn't it? Not that I care! I'm very calm and comfortable, okay?!
Wait, I didn't lose?! That's a nice feeling...
I know I should be happy I won... But I'm a little sad someone else lost...
YunYun just WonWon! Wait, that was the worst thing I ever said!
if you don't want to strip, I won't make you! I... I'd like it if you did though! Wait, not for perverted reasons! P-Promise!
Y-You can strip too! If we're both embarrassed that means we can understand each other better, right?!
I know I'm supposed to give a victory speech like most other Crimson Demons would... but that'd be so embarrassing...
Even if you lost, I really hope you're still enjoying yourself ~name~!
(I want everyone to be my friend... but I really really want ~player~ to be my friend for some reason!)
Oh... ~player~ lost? That's good. Really good. Not because I want to see her naked! Just because, uh, uh... Nevermind!
Why does ~player~ make me feel weird? Wait, did I say that aloud?! So embarrassing...
T-Thanks for spending time with me ~player~... you're making this game really fun...
H-Hey, ~player~? Is it okay if I tell everyone you're my friend? Not in a weird way! Promise!
Oh... you've got to strip ~player~. I-Is it okay if I watch?!
Even though you don't talk to me ~player~, that's still nicer than how most people treat me!
I, um, this game is kind of lewd... isn't it? Not that I care! I'm very calm and comfortable, okay?!
... You've got to strip, right? That was a question, not a demand! Sorry!
Even if you lose, all that matters is that you tried! Why does nobody ever tell me that?
Wait, I didn't lose?! That's a nice feeling...
I know I should be happy I won... But I'm a little sad someone else lost...
YunYun just WonWon! Wait, that was the worst thing I ever said!
You know, winning this game feels really good! Wait, I'm sorry for boasting! I'm humble!
Y-You can strip too! If we're both embarrassed that means we can understand each other better, right?!
I know I'm supposed to give a victory speech like most other Crimson Demons would... but that'd be so embarrassing...
Even if you lost, I really hope you're still enjoying yourself ~name~!
I've always wanted to play a game like this with friends. It's okay if I pretend we're all friends, right?!
This is my first time playing a game like this... does it always go so... slow?
You should all know that I'm the Greatest Genius of the Crimson Magic Clan! Or, um, the s-second Greatest G-Genius...
You know, I'm not dumb okay! I know when people are lying to me! I just... like to pretend they aren't...
It might not be much but it's the thought that counts! Thanks for stripping for us! Please like me!
Keep taking off small things like that! The longer this game lasts the better!
That's a really smart move ~name~! I guess you've got to use all the advantages you have!
That's all? Wait, I'm not complaining! Sorry!
Um, I'll keep playing if you all still want me here...
Please strip more off! I could really use a win!
Can we keep playing now? Please! I'm having fun!
You know... I don't often get to play games like these with other people. I've always wanted to and I just really want to say- Wait, what? Next hand? Already?!
Oh. You've still got a lot left ~name~? Heh, you're... um... making me kind of nervous!
You're taking that off just now? Oh no! I'm totally going to lose!
I've always wanted to play a game like this with friends. It's okay if I pretend we're all friends, right?!
This is my first time playing a game like this... does it always go so... slow?
You should all know that I'm the Greatest Genius of the Crimson Magic Clan! Or, um, the s-second Greatest G-Genius...
You know, I'm not dumb okay! I know when people are lying to me! I just... like to pretend they aren't...
It might not be much but it's the thought that counts! Thanks for stripping for us! Please like me!
Keep taking off small things like that! The longer this game lasts the better!
That's a really smart move ~name~! I guess you've got to use all the advantages you have!
W-Wait, why didn't you take that off first? I'm so confused!
That's all? Wait, I'm not complaining! Sorry!
Um, I'll keep playing if you all still want me here...
Please strip more off! I could really use a win!
Can we keep playing now? Please! I'm having fun!
You know... I don't often get to play games like these with other people. I've always wanted to and I just really want to say- Wait, what? Next hand? Already?!
Oh. You've still got a lot left ~name~? Heh, you're... um... making me kind of nervous!
You're taking that off just now? Oh no! I'm totally going to lose!
Are you really okay with stripping in front of someone like me? Really?! T-Thanks so much!
If it's really embarrassing you can just pretend I'm not here... I'm used to it.
This game is heating up, huh? Can you please agree with me?
Well ~name~, you're running out of small items. Right? Or do you have a bunch hidden?!
This isn't too embarrassing for you, right? I mean, it's barely anything... Wait, I'm not being condescending!
The more time we all get to spend together the better!
You're enjoying this game, right? I hope I'm not ruining it...
Wow. This game is making me really hungry! Anyone else want to go for food afterwords? Just, you know, for practical reasons. I'll pay!
Well, at least we all see something. Um, not that I'm lewd! I'm not!
(Should I try and distract the dealer so we can play for longer? Wait, they are already dealing cards!)
Can we just take a second just to appreciate the time we spend together before we deal the next hand?
Who would've known playing a game with so many other people would've been this fun? I mean, I fantasied it would be. But this is even better than my daydreams!
Are you really okay with stripping in front of someone like me? Really?! T-Thanks so much!
If it's really embarrassing you can just pretend I'm not here... I'm used to it.
This game is heating up, huh? Can you please agree with me?
Well ~name~, you're running out of small items. Right? Or do you have a bunch hidden?!
This isn't too embarrassing for you, right? I mean, it's barely anything... Wait, I'm not being condescending!
The more time we all get to spend together the better!
You're enjoying this game, right? I hope I'm not ruining it...
Wow. This game is making me really hungry! Anyone else want to go for food afterwords? Just, you know, for practical reasons. I'll pay!
Well, at least we all see something. Um, not that I'm lewd! I'm not!
(Should I try and distract the dealer so we can play for longer? Wait, they are already dealing cards!)
Can we just take a second just to appreciate the time we spend together before we deal the next hand?
Who would've known playing a game with so many other people would've been this fun? I mean, I fantasied it would be. But this is even better than my daydreams!
You know ~name~, if you are embarrassed and want to take a break where we all have snacks, that'd be fine by me! More than fine!
Oh, um, wow... Are y-you really taking that off? N-Not that I mind!
You're taking off a lot! This game is a lot!
You don't have to take anything off, if you don't want! I'm against peer pressure... I know what it’s like to feel like to feel like you need to do something.
Y-You really don't have much left ~name~? Well, um, that's what you g-get for playing against a Crimson Demon! ...Sorry!
W-Wait, that already?! Um, time goes fast when you're having fun! You are all having fun, right?
I'm sorry if my eyes suddenly glow red! It's just a thing that happens when I'm excited... It's not dangerous, promise!
Oh... Well, at least I'm not the only loser now... I mean loser as in the game! Not generally!
This game is getting quite lewd... um, I'll try not to be distracted...
I really wish I'd been invited to games like this in the past!
Oh wow... This game is surprisingly fun... and... hot!
This game is getting quite lewd... um, I'll try not to be distracted...
A Critical Hit! That’s something people in my village say a lot, but I never really understood why...
You know ~name~, if you are embarrassed and want to take a break where we all have snacks, that'd be fine by me! More than fine!
Oh, um, wow... Are y-you really taking that off? N-Not that I mind!
You're taking off a lot! This game is a lot!
You don't have to take anything off, if you don't want! I'm against peer pressure... I know what it’s like to feel like to feel like you need to do something.
Y-You really don't have much left ~name~? Well, um, that's what you g-get for playing against a Crimson Demon! ...Sorry!
W-Wait, that already?! Um, time goes fast when you're having fun! You are all having fun, right?!
Oh wow... This game is surprisingly fun... and... hot!
This game is getting quite lewd... um, I'll try not to be distracted...
A Critical Hit! That’s something people in my village say a lot, but I never really understood why...
This game is getting quite lewd... um, I'll try not to be distracted...
Oh... Well, at least I'm not the only loser now... I mean loser as in the game! Not generally!
I'm sorry if my eyes suddenly glow red! It's just a thing that happens when I'm excited... It's not dangerous, promise!
I really wish I'd been invited to games like this in the past!
T-This is hot. T-Thanks for inviting me. Or, um, at least not telling me to leave...
If you see me gawking in your direction, just ignore me! I'm very easily ignorable, promise!
A shirtless guy is normal... But in a game like this, it's completely different!
I'm not blushing! It's, um, just the Crimson Demon complexion?
It's fine for me to look because we're friends now, right? Right?
Are you trying to distract me?! It's not working! I'm a Crimson Demon! Okay?!
You're quite cute ~name~. I hope I'm not overstepping any boundaries by saying that!
I'm allowed to look, right? I'll close my eyes just in case!
If Funifura from the Crimson Demon clan knew I was playing this game they'd be so jealous! And, um... maybe a little ashamed of me.
I'm not blushing! It's, um, just the Crimson Demon complexion?
I've seen a shirtless man before! So... uh, why does this feel different?!
D-Don't distract me! A Crimson Demon's attention is supposed to be unwavering!
The whole game has been building to this specific one moment! (I hope it isn't as disappointing as me!)
Wait, what? Now? This is happening?! But I haven't gotten the chance to mentally prepare myself!
I'm probably the first person ever to see a penis before making a single friend! Why is my life so weird?!
... I, um... Are you really going to do this ~name~? N-Not that I don't want you to!
I know this is what the entire game is about... But I just really liked spending time with you all. I, um, can still look though... Right?
(Don't panic YunYun! This is what all this daydreaming has been preparing you for!)
I-It's surprisingly... cute!
You've got a lot of confidence ~name~! I-It's kind of... s-sexy actually...
Oh! I didn't expect it to be so... small. N-Not that I mind! I t-think it's adorable! W-Wait, is that the right word?
W-Wow. It's, erm... Is a-anyone else feeling hot right now?
I-I'm not blushing! It's just my Crimson Demon complexion! I-It's not a blush!
W-Why am I feeling like I do when I read one of my romance novels?!
I... I won't be distracted! E-Even if it is very very distracting!
Y-You think you can fluster me with s-something like that? I'll still win! I'm a Crimson Demon! Okay?!
You might expect me to become embarrassed. But I've already seen many, many penises in pictures! Wait, that's supposed to be a secret!
I... w-will not... b-be flustered. I can... s-still win...
T-That... is very nice ~name~! Um, right... continue! Continue!
I-I'm not turned on! I-I'm off! I'm always off!
T-That's m-massive! A-And very very intimidating!
I-I, erm, t-that's way too large! I-It's almost scary!
T-That's the biggest one I've ever seen! A-And I've seen... relatively little actually...
I'm innocent! Innocent!
T-That's dangerously large!
I-I'm more scared t-than aroused!
Y-You must have used a lot of Skill Potions ~name~...
I-I guess we can call the game quits then for your sake ~name~... Wait, you're actually doing it?!
I-I have those too! I-It's nothing s-special!
Erm, this game is progressing fast! R-Really fast!
I-I... am very very confused as to how I feel right now...
B-Breasts?! I... I mean, yes. Obviously. Boobs!
This game is very lewd... um, I don't mind if everyone is enjoying it though!
A-Am I allowed to look? I u-understand if not...
O-Oh, erm.. uh, yes?! I'm so c-confused!
Bigger doesn't always mean better. Sometimes the subtle spells are the most powerful!
Y-You shouldn't worry about what other people think of you ~name~! At least other people are thinking of you!
T-They might be small... But they are perky and adorable!
Oh! They are so cute! And not in a condescending way!
A-At least you don't have big things like mine constantly getting in the way...
T-Those are l-lovely... Y-You shouldn't be ashamed ~name~...
That seems to be a perfect size... What? I am not jealous!
They... erm, are nice? Is that an statement to make?
This game is rather lewd... But I will make the most of it...
Whilst I am not ashamed of my own, I still wish mine looked like that... They are so pretty and perky!
You're very beautiful ~name~!
(My mind is filled with thoughts of boobies! This is so unprofessional of an Arch-Mage!)
C-Could you move them a little? No? Okay...
A-Are those bigger than mine?!
A-Are those even bigger than mine?! How am I feeling insecure about this?!
I feel like we've only started this game... And yet...
Seeing this is not a usual occurrence for arch-mage... But we Crimson Demons are a versatile sort able to hand any situation... Even one l-like t-this!
The game demands you to reveal everything! Not me! I'm not some kind of pervert who would propose such demands!
This is the most intimate part a woman owns! And yet, you are showing it to someone like me! I will always appreciate this!
You are brave ~name~ for showing all to us! Maybe I will allow someone like you to join me in my travels... P-Please!
All will be revealed! I-I will endevour not to stare, t-though no promises, as sometimes even a Crimson Demon cannot control their d-devilish u-urges...
Y-You really are c-cute ~name~... Much cuter than me...
I-I see you. I s-shall take one glance and then s-stop looking out of politeness. M-Maybe a second.
You are a very attractive woman. You must have no troubles making friends...
As this game gets lewder... I feel myself feel become more titillated. Is this normal? Am I normal?!
A lustful sight! Even the most trained Crimson Demon would blush at such a sight... So, erm, that explains my f-face...
It's not often I get to glance upon another girl like this. Therefore my stares are purely curiosity! Not anything lewd!
You are here for a supposed Social Interaction seminar, correct? Why don't you practice with me?
Y-You are very quiet Komi-san. D-Do not worry though, I am used to people not talking to me...
Wait, we've got to do what when we lose?! And that happens every round!?
I guess I'll stay... just because a Crimson Demon never quits! Uh, right?
Do... they all look like that? Why do I feel so... fuzzy?
I won! I beat ~name~! Eh!? ~Name~'s going to beat his--
Victory is mine! I, YunYun, have bested player, and will now be showered with-- oh no! I-I was going to say praise, not--!
~Name~ has been defeated, and must perform the ritual of staff recharge! I-- as Archwizard, it would be wrong for me not to oversee such a rite!
I-I have completely beaten ~name~! His clothing has fallen away, and soon he will spill his vital essence to... me? ~Name~!
Recognize the skill of I, YunYun! Now, ~name~, as is tradition for this game, p-please show me your skill in return...
You thought it would be Megumin, but it was me, YunYun, who defeated you, ~name~!
~Name~, your stamina has been exhausted! But still you keep fighting? How noble and brave, but not enough! Show me your finishing move! ...Just not in the face, okay!?
Behold ~name~'s final moments! I-I will spare him the indignity of defeat as long as he... he looks at me while he...
Yes, ~name~, look upon the face of your... are you okay? D-don't be sad, you can look at me while you-- j-just... um... p-please don't make a mess of me...
~Name~! You have already beaten me, the least you can do is show me that you find me beautiful!
P-p-please forgive me, ~name~! B-but I require you to look at me!
I-I have never seen a man brandish his staff so brazenly-- t-though it would be v-very rude for you not to show proper appreciation!
I-I think you played really well, but... I-I really want to see this so please...
U-um... ~name~... n-no... No! I won! You have to say my name when you finish!
I am an archwizard! T-to be initiated into my... m-my mysteries you should-- ~name~? P-pay attention!
...I-if my body is pleasing to you, you could at least compliment it... b-by looking...
I am a woman of no small skill! I will have you know that I-I... I-I studied the black speech of eroticism--
~Name~... a-are you going to... look at me while you...?
I-I see! You demand a fair trade! Very well, ~name~, I will speak your name and you will speak mine as we look at each other...
W-whatever you do, ~name~, j-just please respect my abilities as an Archwizard!
A-as an archwizard, I can e-enchant your Divine Rod... w-with my Sacred Oils...
... I'm enjoying this game too much! Sorry!
Oh, oh no! ~Name~, a-are you in need of healing? I don't know magic like that-- I'm so sorry?
A-Ah? ~Name~, am I... s-should I pose better?

~Name~! If... okay... when I lose... I-I will remember this moment!

I... you have spilled your vitas vitae on the floor... i-is anyone else going to...? N-no? O-of course I wouldn't, that's...

I'm... ~name~! I will be watching you and cheering you on-- s-so, since I'm saying your name, you should find mine easy to say and think about-- it-it is a bit embarrassing but I don't think anyone's ever thought of me while--
D-do not despair, ~name~! Though you have been defeated by me, YunYun, I am gracious in victory and will a-allow o-or even encourage you to look at me--
I did it! I did it! I beat ~name~, and now she-- she should look at the woman who beat her! I-I am a powerful archwizard deserving of respect!

I-I really beat ~name~! S-sorry, ~name~, I just can't believe it!

H-how can... w-would you like to stare at me? Should I undress more-- ~name~, are you even... no...

~Name~, do you want me to...? O-oh, yes, ~name~, you're so much more graceful using your fingers on yourself that I would be--
~Name~! You'd... I-I wish I could touch you-- w-with my fingers, or my tongue, even! J-just because it would make you feel good.
I think you're a beautiful girl, with accomplished skills, who deserves the respect of her friends and comrades-- u-um... I-I know that's not sexual but I th-thought it was what you'd want to hear...

~Name~ is just... so hard to look away from. I'm really quite jealous!

I... think we've gotten to know each other m-much better! S-so, it wouldn't be at all inappropriate for us to continue s-spending time together, would it ?
